Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பகைநட்பாம் காலம் வருங்கால் முகநட்டு அகநட்பு ஒரீஇ விடல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: When one's foes begin to affect friendship, one should love them with one's looks, and, cherishing no love in the heart, give up (even the former).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An old enemy is now approaching with a smile, pretending to be a friend ('பகை நட்பாம் காலம்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: A wise person is shown greeting them with a perfectly friendly and smiling face ('முகநட்டு'). However, a surreal view into their heart reveals that there is absolutely no bond of friendship there; the space is empty ('அகநட்பு ஒரீஇ').
Layered_Composition.Background: The wise person is maintaining a peaceful facade while completely severing any possibility of true internal attachment, thus managing the dangerous situation with perfect control.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: When a time comes that an enemy pretends to be a friend, smile with your face, but completely abandon any friendship in your heart.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The smiling face with the empty heart is the central metaphor. It is a visual representation of maintaining a diplomatic exterior while having no internal illusions.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The external scene is lit with a neutral, pleasant light. The symbolic view of the heart is shown as a clean, empty, and perhaps even cold, void.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A close-up on the wise person's face, with a surreal overlay showing their empty heart.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a strong focus on the contrast between the smiling face and the empty interior.
